titleStmt.title: William Alablasters [sic] seuen motuies [sic]. Remoued and confuted by Iohn Racster.
Booke of the seven planets
titleStmt.author: Racster, John.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Peter Short for Andrew Wise dwelling in Paules Church-yard at the signe of the Angell,

notesStmt.note: Another issue, with cancel title page printed as M4, of: Racster, John. A booke of the seven planets.
Identified as STC 20601 on UMI microfilm reel 1002.
Reproductions of the original in the Harvard University. Library.
Appears at reel 1002:9 (identified as STC 20601), and at reel 1823 ⁵ (both Harvard University Library. copy).

place.placeName: Paules Church-yard at the signe of the Angell
